uk.ac.open.kmi.iserve.discovery.disco.impl

Class SparqlLogicConceptMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.open.kmi.iserve.discovery.api.impl.AbstractMatcher
      • uk.ac.open.kmi.iserve.discovery.disco.impl.SparqlLogicConceptMatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ConceptMatcher, Matcher

    public class SparqlLogicConceptMatcher
extends AbstractMatcher
implements ConceptMatcher
    SparqlLogicConceptMatcher implements a Matcher for concepts directly backed by a SPARQL endpoint. The response time of this matcher will be fine for human interactions but too slow for high frequency queries by software such as composition engines. Does not require to maintain its own index.
    Since:
    30/07/2013
    Author:
    Carlos Pedrinaci (KMi - The Open University)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
